name: Ritva Viljanen
descriptionHeader: Jury Chair, Deputy Mayor, City of Helsinki
descriptionContent: Ritva Viljanen serves as Deputy Mayor of the City of Helsinki, in charge of Educational and Cultural Affairs. Before becoming Deputy Mayor, Mrs. Viljanen was Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of the Interior (2003–2012) and Director General of the Population Register Centre (1997–2003).

name: Mark Wigley
descriptionHeader: Dean Emeritus of the Graduate School of Architecture
descriptionContent: An accomplished scholar and design teacher, Mark Wigley has written extensively on the theory and practice of architecture and is the author of Constant’s New Babylon: The Hyper-Architecture of Desire (1998); White Walls, Designer Dresses: The Fashioning of Modern Architecture (1995).
